channel.title: Website not displaying a text file
channel.description:
I'm using 000webhost.com to host an applet of my 2D Game. I have all the resources (tile and sprite sheets as well as a map text file) uploaded on the host. The problem is that the FTP client can view the map file that I uploaded and correctly displays what is inside it, but whenever I navigate to that myself off of the site chrome says that the link is broken. It's not only the map file either. I have another text file that tells you what numbers go with what tile and chrome tells me that that link is broken as well. I feel that it's causing issues with the applet because it can't load the map, so any ideas?
website: 2dgame.herobo.com
map: http://2dgame.herobo.com/res/maps/map.txt tiles: http://2dgame.herobo.com/res/res/Tile%20Declarations.txt

item.title: Website not displaying a text file

@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

I’m using 000webhost.com to host an applet of my 2D Game. I have all the resources (tile and sprite sheets as well as a map text file) uploaded on the host. The problem is that the FTP client can view the map file that I uploaded and correctly displays what is inside it, but whenever I navigate to that myself off of the site chrome says that the link is broken. It’s not only the map file either. I have another text file that tells you what numbers go with what tile and chrome tells me that that link is broken as well. I feel that it’s causing issues with the applet because it can’t load the map, so any ideas?
